metadata.synopsis: When the character interacts with a series of portals in House of Hope (portals to different realms/cities) he gives a bit of personal comment about that destination. Portals are inert - they could not be used to actually go there.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: Luskan, City of Sails, at the far north of the Sword Coast, in the shadow of the Spine of the World.
0.context: NodeContext: Minsc: referencing Jarlaxle, but not judging.
